word:
"Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for 


            -295- 

his friends. Ye are My friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you. Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of My Father I have made known unto you" [verses 13-15].
